001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice;
004
005/**
006 * Root class for sensors
007 *
008 * @param <T> The Sensor hardware device
009 * @author Alex Stedman
010 */
011@Deprecated
012@SuppressWarnings("unused")
013public abstract class Sensor<T extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice>
014    extends HardwareDevice<T> {
015
016    /**
017     * Create a sensor
018     *
019     * @param device The device
020     */
021    public Sensor(T device) {
022        super(device);
023    }
024
025    /**
026     * Create sensor
027     *
028     * @param deviceName The device name in hardware map
029     */
030    public Sensor(String deviceName) {
031        super(deviceName);
032    }
033}
